desc: Dream Weaver is a Canadian lifestyle retailer dedicated to inspiring socially-conscious consumers with a well-curated mix of luxurious Canadian, ethical and sustainable products. Founded in 1993, Dream Weaver features Fashion & Accessories, Bath & Body, Home Decor, Gourmet Food & Gifts.

layout.text: Trygvi and Ragnar Welcome you to Dream Weaver!
Be the first to know about NEW products and SALES
